Detailed Description

A binomial opinion, x = (b_,d_,a_,u_).

* b_: belief * d_: disbelief * u_: uncertainty about belief * a_: atomicity is the prior probability of the two outcomes, usually 0.5

Author:
Ozge C. Ozcanli
Date:
Jan 26, 2012
    Modifications
     <none yet>
